snippet: The partner of President François Hollande of France threw her support behind a candidate running against Mr. Hollande’s former partner, and his children are said to be unhappy.
abstract: Thomas Hollande, son of President Francois Hollande and his former partner, Segolene Royal, denies report in the French weekly Le Point, which said he blasted his father’s current partner, Valerie Trierweile, for backing a political opponent of his mother; the younger Hollande says a journalist he had a conversation with twisted his words.

byline.original: By STEVEN ERLANGER and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: The partner of President François Hollande of France threw her support behind a candidate running against Mr. Hollande’s former partner, and his children are said to be unhappy.

headline.seo: Hollande Family Dispute Surfaces in France
headline.main: Some Family Drama Undoes Hollande’s Goal of ‘Normal’
headline.print_headline: Some Family Drama Undoes Hollande’s Goal of ‘Normal’
